description: The Creativity Gateway is a systematic approach to creativity. The Creativity Gateway science of creativity is based on a review of relevant results of the most current studies on the process of creativity. A true understanding of the science reveals principles that will help you understand the creative process and disprove a number of prevalent myths related to the topic. The Creativity Gateway is composed of the following Building Blocks: Supercharging Your Creative Energy; Expanding Your Knowledge Base; and Enhancing Your Networking to boost your creativity. Note: This course is an abridged version of Creativity Gateway: How to Enhance Your Creativity, explaining the science of creativity.
title: Creativity Gateway: The Science of Creativity
